ourStory.title: Our story
ourStory.body: Nur & Garden was born on the fertile lands of Samarkand. Each grain of rice is the patient gift of nature. We blend generational expertise with contemporary technology to deliver impeccable taste and enduring quality.

jasmine.longDescription: Nur & Garden Jasmine is selected for its floral bouquet and silken texture. Each grain carries a luminous, gentle finish that elevates light, aromatic dishes.

basmati.longDescription: Royal Basmati is crafted for celebratory tables and impeccable pilaf. Long grains remain separated when cooked, preserving structure and aroma.

organic.longDescription: Organic Harmony is grown with certified organic practices. A balanced profile and authentic taste make it a wholesome daily staple.

black.longDescription: Velvet Noir black rice is naturally rich in antioxidants. Its dramatic color and layered taste bring a touch of couture to the table.

brown.longDescription: Golden Brown wholegrain rice delivers fiber and essential vitamins. An essential companion for mindful wellness routines.

fusion.longDescription: Silk Fusion harmonizes oriental elegance with modern gastronomy. Its bespoke blend is curated in limited micro-batches.
